UMP Jawa Barat Naik Jadi Rp 1,8 Juta Tahun Depan
01 Nov 2019, 11:50 by Mukhlis Dinillah


Gubernur Jawa Barat Ridwan Kamil/Foto: Ari Saputra

Bandung - Upah Minimum Provinsi (UMP) 2020 Jawa Barat (Jabar) ditetapkan sebesar Rp 1.810.351,36 ,naik 8,51% dari tahun sebelumnya Rp 1.668.372,83. Penetapan tersebut tercantum dalam Surat Keputusan Gubernur Nomor 561/Kep.1046-Yanbangsos/2018 Tentang UMP Jabar 2020.Gubernur Jabar Ridwan Kamil mengungkapkan penetapan UMP ini sesuai dengan Peraturan Pemerintah (PP) Nomor 78/2015 Tentang Pengupahan. UMP ini juga akan menjadi dasar bagi kabupaten/kota dalam menetapkan UMK 2020.Penghitungan kenaikan UMP ini berdasarkan data inflasi nasional dan pertumbuhan ekonomi nasional (pertumbuhan Produk Domestik Bruto) yang akan digunakan untuk menghitung upah minimum tahun 2020 bersumber dari Badan Pusat Statistik Republik Indonesia (BPS RI). "Tingkat inflasi nasional sebesar 3,39% dan pertumbuhan PDB sebesar 5,12%. Sehingga kenaikan UMP tahun 2020 8,51 persen," kata Kepala Dinas Tenaga Kerja dan Transmigrasi Jabar Ade Afriandi di Gedung Sate, Kota Bandung, Jumat (1/11/2019).Sementara itu, Gubernur Jabar Ridwan Kamil mengatakan penetapan UMP ini sudah sesuai dengan formulasi yang pemerintah pusat. Sehingga, pihaknya yakin tidak akan terjadi penolakan di masyarakat."Saya ngikutin aturan pemerintah saja (UMP). Biasanya nggak akan ada gejolak (UMP)," ujar pria yang biasa disapa RK itu di Gedung DPRD Jabar.Ia menuturkan besaran UMP ini akan menjadi dasar dalam penetapan Upah Minimum Kota/Kabupaten (UMK) 2020. Ia memastikan kenaikannya akan berada di angka 8 persenan."Iya biasanya di angka 8 persenan untuk UMK nanti. Biasanya gejolak terjadi di penetapan UMK kita lihat nanti seperti apa," kata RK.Simak Video "Asyik! UMP Tahun 2020 Naik 8,51%"[Gambas:Video 20detik](mud/hns)

West Java UMP Increases to Rp 1.8 Million Next Year
01 Nov 2019, 11:50 by Mukhlis Dinillah


West Java Governor Ridwan Kamil / Photo: Ari Saputra

Bandung - Provincial Minimum Wage (UMP) 2020 West Java (West Java) is set at Rp 1,810,351.36, up 8.51% from the previous year Rp 1,668,372.83. The stipulation is stated in Governor Decree Number 561 / Kep.1046-Yanbangsos / 2018 About West Java UMP 2020. West Java Governor Ridwan Kamil revealed that this UMP stipulation is in accordance with Government Regulation (PP) Number 78/2015 About Wages. This UMP will also be the basis for districts / cities in setting the UMK 2020. The calculation of the UMP increase is based on national inflation data and national economic growth (Gross Domestic Product growth) which will be used to calculate the 2020 minimum wage sourced from the Central Statistics Agency of the Republic of Indonesia ( RI BPS). "The national inflation rate is 3.39% and GDP growth is 5.12%. So the 2020 UMP increase is 8.51 percent," said Head of the West Java Manpower and Transmigration Office Ade Afriandi at Gedung Sate, Bandung City, Friday (1 / 11/2019). Meanwhile, West Java Governor Ridwan Kamil said that the determination of the UMP was in accordance with the formulation of the central government. So, he is sure that there will be no rejection in the community. "I will only follow government regulations (UMP). Usually there will be no turmoil (UMP)," said the man who is usually called the RK in West Java Parliament Building. basic in determining the City / Regency Minimum Wage (UMK) 2020. He ensured the increase would be at 8 percent. "Yes, usually at 8 percent for the UMK later. Usually the turmoil occurs in the determination of the UMK we will see later," said RK.
